question: Did Prophet Muhammed [saw] wear a turban or Amamah? If yes colour and method of wearing it. Please refer hadiths.

ANSWER

To wear an Amaamah (turban) is the Sunnah of our beloved Rasul (Sallallaahu
Alayhi Wasallam). (Shamaail)

Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) had a black, white and green
Amaamah (Ibid)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
